name: A Special Place In Hell (itch)
description:
There's a special place in Hell for people like you...

It's called the throne. >:)

Or at least it would be, once you get that other guy out of the way.

Details

This game is basically just a really short bullet hell, where you take on the final boss immediately. Bullet hell experts could probably clear this in like five minutes.

Arrow keys control movement. There's no basic attack button; that's automatic. Pressing Z or X will cast one of two spells respectively, once your Mana bar is full.

Credits
